messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] good morning america
messages.msgSnippet: It doesn t have to be. Not everyone has to like unschooling. Not everyone has to understand it. It is part of the process towards acceptance. People fear what
messages.messageBody:
It doesn't have to be. Not everyone has to like unschooling. Not everyone
has to understand it. It is part of the process towards acceptance.

People fear what they don't understand and hate what they can't conquer.
Andrew Smith

Faith
